ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 675
ygData.msgSnippet: What store did you go to? I know that at Electronics Boutique(sp?)  should have the new EQ Gold that has all the expansions up to and including PoP. At least
ygData.messageBody:
What store did you go to? I know that at Electronics Boutique(sp?) should
have the new EQ Gold that has all the expansions up to and including PoP.
At least all the EB's in the malls here in Jax, Fl do. I plan on getting it
for the account with my chanter and pally on it as soon as I don't have to
worry about my bills leaving my paychecks near to empty after paying them,
which should be within the next couple of weeks.

Halyburton Bearhugger 51 Barb Shammy
Illicon 16 High Elf Enchanter
Qapmoc 11 Half Elf Ranger
Doktari 11 High Elf Cleric
Mittion 7 Human Paladin

----- Original Message -----
From: "Thomas Houseman" <thomashouseman@...>



> Many thanks everyone.
>
> The local computer store only had Planes of Power in stock and not Shadows
> of Lucin, so that sorta decided for me.
> Thanks for all your thoughts though. I also don't like to be dependant on
> wizzies or druids for travel as I play in a different time zone than most
> other people on my server so I tend to only have 3-20 people in a zone at
> once.... hence I do quite a bit of soloing.....
>
> T.
